name: Lover Bands: Unleashed!
description:
The spiritual sequel to the hit game Lover Bands on Steam!

What if Droko and Gannatail weren't tied together? Introducing Lover Bands: Unleashed, a two-player runner game!

Controls:

P1 jump: Space

P2 jump: Enter

Esc to leave the game at any time.

Work together to clear the levels and beat the game!
